name: Inverted Space (AfifZ)
description:
Inverted Space

A Space Pirate seeks all of Space's Hidden Treasures.

He hears about a Legendary Jam that is worth a fortune.

But the Jam is protected by Space Aliens

Our Pirate goes through all the difficulties and defeats the Aliens

But when he obtains the Jam. Something wrong happens.

Controls:

- [WASD] or Arrow Keys to Move Around.

- [Z] or [J] To Shoot.

- [Spacebar] To Activate Shield.

-[X] or [K] To Use Laser.

Credits:

-Programmming By: Afif Zughayer

-Sprites By: Ayham Nassar

-Extra Help from: Hani Hisham

Tools used:

-Unity 2019.3.7f1 Personal

-Piskel

-Pixlr

-Bfxr

-Audacity

Made for the Brackeys Game Jam 2020.2.
